item.title: Climate change mans Southern Africa got a year’s worth of rain in just 10 days, killing over 100 people
item.description: Around 1.3 million people across southern Africa were affected by this month's floods, The World Health Organization said.

item.title: German chancellor on Trump’s claim that it didn’t fight in Afghanistan: we lost 59 soldiers
item.description: Friedrich Merz said that not only did 59 German troops die in Afghanistan over nearly 20 years, but well over 100 were wounded as well.

item.description: "Sunshine" says she can spot idling SUVs, out-of-state plates and the difference between an undercover cop car from an unmarked immigration vehicle.
